title: Why the Sussexes want to go it alone
text:
I feel sorry for Prince Harry. All his good intentions for his and Meghan’s 10-day royal tour of Africa have been overshadowed. And it had all started so well.

The constant drip of criticism that they’d experienced had been replaced by the kind of warm and enthusiastic reporting he and Meghan had received before and during their wedding.

Rather than follow the royal rule book, the couple had successfully made the tour their own – promoting causes they passionately care about – climate change, minefields, women’s rights and gender-based violence.

Crowds on the ground and back at home delighted in Archie’s debut when he appeared being introduced to Archbishop Desmond Tutu. The Duke and Duchess...
description: I feel sorry for Prince Harry.
